## Article01: Official Manual

Following https://reprex.tidyverse.org

Letâ€™s say you copy this code onto your clipboard:

``` r
(y <- 1:4)
mean(y)
``` 

Then call reprex(), where the default target venue is GitHub:

``` r
reprex()
``` 

You get on the clipboard:

``` r
(y <- 1:4)
  #> [1] 1 2 3 4
mean(y)
  #> [1] 2.5
```
